metadata.title: Monotonicity properties for a ratio of finite many gamma functions

body_text.text: This paper is motivated by a series of papers [2, 11, 12, 16, 19, 21, 27, 29, 32]. For detailed review and survey, please read the papers [19, 27, 29, 32] and closely related references therein.
This paper is a slightly revised version of the electronic preprint [30].
